clauses.text: Customer retains all rights, title, and interest in and to Customer Data and any pre-existing Customer intellectual property. Provider retains all rights to the Service and Provider's pre-existing intellectual property.
All work product, deliverables, and intellectual property created specifically for Customer under this Agreement shall be owned exclusively by Customer upon full payment of all fees.
Customer grants Provider a limited, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use Customer Data solely for the purpose of providing the Service during the Term.
